title: Death Notice - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Fantasy   Horror   Mature   Mystery   Psychological   Sci-fi   Supernatural
tags: Antihero Protagonist   Clever Protagonist   Cold Protagonist   Cunning Protagonist   Determined Protagonist   Evil Protagonist   Eye Powers   Famous Protagonist   Fanfiction   Game Elements   Genius Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Male Protagonist   Misunderstandings   Multiple Identities   Multiple Personalities   Multiple Realms   Murders   Romantic Subplot   Serial Killers   Survival   Transported to Another World   Weak to Strong   Zombies
author: Gluttonous Monk   饕餮居士
description:
He is a gifted and intelligent young man. He is a murderer that enjoys the bloodshed.

He has a split personality disorder, yet his IQ far exceeds that of normal people.

He entered a maximum security prison as a young boy, but he made himself a genius by reading extensively in the prison.

He has two names. The first one is Qin Lun, the other is Joey.

Today will be his execution day…>
